title: The Subscription Payments Experience
summary: This page discusses the critical role of the payments experience in subscription businesses, emphasizing its impact on customer satisfaction, loyalty, and retention. It highlights that while companies often focus on product and support, the payment process is a key touchpoint that can either be seamless or disruptive.
key_points: Subscription companies must be customer-obsessed due to the deep trust involved in ongoing relationships.
Improving customer satisfaction and loyalty directly impacts revenue and profitability.
Key customer touchpoints in subscriptions are the product/service, customer support, and the payments experience.
The payments experience can be either invisible and seamless or painful and disruptive for customers.
